name: INIntentHandlingStatus
desc: Constants indicating the current state of the interaction.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The status of the interaction is unknown. This is the default value.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: The intent is ready to be handled, but has not yet been handled.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: The Intents extension is in the process of handling the intent.

items.name: case success
items.desc: The Intents extension successfully handled the intent.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: The Intents extension encountered an unrecoverable problem when handling the intent.

items.name: case deferredToApplication
items.desc: The Intents extension asked its associated app to handle the intent.
